questions: Q. 1. How does public sector help in the development of a country ?
answers: Ans. Public sector invests in key and basic industries as health education defence where private sector cannot invest.  1

questions: Q. 2. “What is the intention of the government in raising money through taxes ?”  1 mark each
answers: Ans. Government raise money through taxes and other ways to meet expenses on the services rendered by it.
